task.title: Posting a Status Update
task.shortdesc: This document list steps about how to post a status update using the facebook app.

context.p: 1. This task describes the steps to post a status update in the facebook app.
2. Use this task to post a status update on your facebook account timeline and newfeed.
3. If you want to post a status update on your facebook account timeline and newsfeed, use this task.

step.cmd: Use the audience selector to control who can see your status update.
You have several options when posting a status. It can just be text or you can include a picture or a description of what you are doing.
If you want people to know where you are, you can include a location.
If you want to include one or more of your friends, you can tag them in your status by tapping this button, then making your selection.
When you are finished, tap Post.

taskbody.result: Your status update will appear on your timeline and newsfeed.
